name: Maze Collector
description:
Maze Collector: It is a short first-person puzzle game that is about a collector who, in this case, seeks to collect watches on an unknown planet to add them to his museum, you must enter the maze and escape from the creature that protects it while looking for your treasures.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump: Space

Crouch: ctrl

Sprint: shift+WASD
